title: Best Final Prime Day Apple Watch Deals
content:
Macworld

One of the best times of the year to get a good deal on a new Apple Watch is during Amazon’s Prime Day Sale. This fall, Prime Day is on October 10-11.

During the two-day sale, we’ll be tracking all the best deals on the Apple Watch, and we’ll even have some early deals up before the event (which are sometimes just as good). The latest Apple Watches are the Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Ultra 2, and second-gen Apple Watch SE, but you can sometimes find good deals on last year’s models, too.

The Amazon Prime Sale is only open to Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139 / £95 / AUD$59 annually, or $14.99 / £8.99 / AUD$6.99 on a monthly basis. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window.

  • Apple Watch Series 9 (45mm) GPS+Cellular: $520 ($9 off, MSRP $529)

Prime Day: Best Apple Watch SE deals

The Apple Watch SE is the more affordable option, essentially a cross between an Apple Watch Series 4 and Series 6. Its display isn’t quite as large and doesn’t have the always-on feature, nor does it have the blood oxygen or ECG features. But it still does most of what people want an Apple Watch for, while saving you around $100.

Prime Day Sale: How can I get the best Apple Watch deals?

Amazon Prime Day typically runs in July, while Amazon also runs an Amazon Prime Early Access Sale in October in the following countries: Austria, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Mexico, the Netherlands, Portugal, Singapore, Spain, the U.K., and the U.S.

The Amazon Prime Day Sale is open only to Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139 / £95 / AUD$59 annually, or $14.99 / £8.99 / AUD$6.99 on a monthly basis. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window.

Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.
